item.title: Latest release
item.description: This article contains a summary of recent changes, enhancements and bug fixes in Aspose.OCR for C++ 24.1.0 (January 2024) release. GPU version: 24.1.0 What was changed Key Summary Category OCRCPPâ€‘554 Deprecated methods and structures have been removed to simplify the API. Enhancement Public API changes and backwards compatibility This section lists all public API changes introduced in Aspose.OCR for C++ 24.
